content: looshkin the cat copyright jamie smart with his permission you may have seen looshkin in the phoenix comic or his own series of books everyone loves looshkin the maddest cat in the world a simple amigumi pattern i have only made it using dk acrylic and a 3mm and 3 5mm hook but i am sure it would work with chunky yarn and a larger hook or finer cotton and smaller hook to match if needed i can make a video of the pattern depending on feedback i get i have had a few people pattern test this for me so thank you icy grace kate caro suzy abby and all the other people who have had a go for me additional feedback is welcome and me and jamie would love to see your makes
